page.title: 11NEWLANDS
page.content: NEWLANDS IS OWNED AND FARMED BY BASIL BAIRD. THE FARM IS SITUATED ALONG TANNERS LAND, A PRIVATE ROAD, OFF NEWGATE LANE AND RUNS ALONG THE BOUNDARY OF H.M.S. COLLINGWOOD. THE WORKFORCE IS SMALL. WHEAT, RAPE AND POTATOES ARE CULTIVATED ON A ROTATION SYSTEM. THE FARM IS BEST KNOWN FOR ITS PIGS. THESE ARE REARED, SLAUGHTERED AND THEN SOLD IN THE FARM SHOP. OTHER MEAT SOLD IN THE FARM SHOP IS BOUGHT IN FROM A WHOLESALER. THERE HAVE BEEN MANY COMPLAINTS FROM LOCAL RESIDENTS ABOUT THE SMELL FROM THE PIGGERY.
